item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: December 10, 2025 Today's Verse 1 Peter 3:12–13 [12] For the eyes of the Lord are on the righteous, and his ears are open to their prayer. But the face of the Lord is against those who do evil.” [13] Now who is there to harm you if you are zealous for what is good? Today's Memory Verse Romans 12: 1-2 - I appeal to you therefore, brothers, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship.
